name: The Escape Of Pixel
description:
You play as a plain blue square from a classic little NES game. Your goal is to find out what is going on, and figur a way out of the games secret system.

Made for the Community Game Jam, with the theme "The game is a liar".

And there is a of course a lot of references to the host of the jam!

The game is a 2d puzzel platformer, and the controls are as follows:

Movement: WASD, Arrows or left controller joystick.

Jump: W, Up arrow, SPACE or button 1 on controller.

Restart Level: R.

BE AWARE THAT THE GAME CONTAINS QUICK FLASHING COLOURS, AND EFFECTS THAT SOME MIGHT FIND NAUSEATING OR UNCOMFORTABLE!

If the camera gets stock to the one side of the character, move back and fourth. This should make it normal again.

Feel free to ask questions or leave feedback in the comments!
